Package Ch13_ColorImages

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Brighten_Index_Image  
    Brighten_Rgb_1  
    Brighten_Rgb_2  
    Convert_Rgb_To_Gray
    This ImageJ plugin converts an RGB color image to a grayscale image using a specific set of component weights for caclulating the luminance (luma) values.
    Count_Colors  
    Desaturate_Rgb  
    Hsv_Test  
    Index_To_Rgb  
    Make_Index_Transparent
    Makes a specific color of the current (index) color image transparent.
    Quantize_KMeans
    ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of the KMeansClusteringQuantizer class.
    Quantize_KMeans_Apache
    ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of the KMeansClusteringQuantizerApache class.
    Quantize_Median_Cut
    ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of the MedianCutQuantizer class.
    Quantize_Octree
    ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of the OctreeQuantizer class.
    Random_Color_Demo
    ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of RandomHueGenerator.
    Show_Lookup_Table
